snippet.textDisplay:
Firstly thank you so much for the time and effort you put into explaining this for us basic folk like me. Very difficult to otherwise know when you have no medical background. 

I have a question which is 
I suffer with auto immune disease chronic inflammation and have had a fair few cases of pneumonia and other infections on one occasion resulting in sepsis. Very recently almost nearly got to that stage. I commonly have a low BP anywhere around 80/90 over 50/60. I have been told this is not good but not too sure why. Is this indicative or organ failure (Allah forbid) or anything else I'm not sure of?
